articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: Officials in China have reportedly put forth a set of proposals for a “government-controlled internet” to a UN metaverse focus group.
articles.title: China Is Taking Its Social Credit System to the Metaverse: Report

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: With a mere 1 PH/s in hash power, the lucky miner enjoys vastly fewer resources than what major industrial-scale Bitcoin mining pools boast.
articles.title: Another Lucky Solo Miner Nabs $160,000 Bitcoin Block Reward

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Markets are down bad and meme coins—the riskier assets—are bearing the brunt. Last week’s chaotic Shibarium launch also helped sink the price of SHIB.
articles.title: Meme Coins PEPE, SHIB Plummet More Than 20% Over the Week

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The Twitter-linked crypto app has taken off, lifting activity and the amount in fees accrued by the Coinbase-incubated Base network.
articles.title: Base Network Sees Activity Soar Past Arbitrum, Optimism Amid Friend.tech Frenzy

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Recur is the latest NFT-centered firm with big-name partnerships to announce its platform is shutting down.
articles.title: NFT Platform Recur to Shut Down Despite $50M Raise and Big Name Backers

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: Lawyers for Gemini say the SEC can’t prove the company was selling securities to customers, and wants the lawsuit thrown out.
articles.title: 'Failure to State a Claim': Gemini Pushes to Get SEC Case Dismissed

articles.author: Decrypt AI, Edited by Ryan Ozawa
articles.description: The judge dismissed claims that the sanctions violated the First Amendment rights of Tornado Cash users.
articles.title: Tornado Cash Sanctions Affirmed by Federal Court

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Twitter was full of unsubstantiated rumors about Tether’s exposure to bankrupt Chinese property giant Evergrande.
articles.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Gitcoin Admits Shell Deal Was a Mistake, Trump’s Crypto Wallet Gets Outed

articles.author: Decrypt AI, Edited by Ryan Ozawa
articles.description: The Glow Token CEO says he was duped by scam artists posing as representatives of the major digital currency exchange.
articles.title: Token Founder Loses $250,000 and His House in Scam, Sues Crypto.com

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The FTX founder needs better access to evidence, his lawyers argue, even as his defense may be that his lawyers made him do it.
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Wants Regular Release From Jail, May Blame Lawyers In His Defense

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: A new exhibition in Los Angeles features Ginsberg-esque poems crafted by AI, inspired by the artist’s photographs.
articles.title: Can Robots Be Beatniks? An AI-Powered Allen Ginsberg Finds Out

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: A joint university study suggests that people with a strong belief in God are more willing to trust advice from AI over humans.
articles.title: Believe In God? You Might Believe In AI, Too

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Unassuming astrocytes, thought to merely be helper brain cells, are more than meets the eye.
articles.title: Scientists Uncover Biological Echoes in Powerful AI Transformer Models

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Cybercriminals have raked in over $2 Billion over the last five years, TRM Labs says.
articles.title: North Korean Hackers Have Stolen $200 Million So Far This Year: Report

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: A major selloff this week sent the prices of all leading cryptocurrencies spiraling down.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: Flash Crash! Bitcoin and Ethereum Shed 10% as Altcoins Tumble

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Tokenization is back in a big way.
articles.title: Crypto's Oldest Use Case Is Back in the Spotlight. But Why Now?

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: OpenSea investor Mark Cuban expressed disappointment in the marketplace's move as creators plot potential boycotts and restrictions.
articles.title: Mark Cuban, Yuga Labs Lead Backlash Over OpenSea's NFT Royalties Change

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Elon or Evergrande—or something else entirely? Experts share what caused Bitcoin's flash crash Thursday, and what to expect ahead.
articles.title: Bitcoin Is Down Bad Again—Here's Why and What Comes Next

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Roblox is being blamed for third-party online casinos that use its currency, Robux, and facilitate underage gambling. Will the case stick?
articles.title: Roblox Enables 'Illicit Gambling' for Kids, Lawsuit Alleges

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The Twitter owner revealed plans to axe the block feature, igniting swift backlash among users citing safety concerns on the platform.
articles.title: Elon Musk Says He's Killing Twitter's Block Feature, Sparking Outcry

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Exactly, a credit market on the Optimism network, was hacked on Friday as thieves exploited its bridge to swipe a stash of ETH.
articles.title: Another Crypto Bridge Collapses as DeFi Lender on Optimism Suffers $7 Million Attack

articles.author: Ali Shutler
articles.description: With his debut single "Angels" out today, Seedphrase says he understands skepticism but wants to "let the music do the talking."
articles.title: Meet the DJ Who Wears a CryptoPunk Helmet While He Spins

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: The 45-year-old Bryan Johnson is undergoing therapy using sound waves to help him attempt to achieve the erections of a healthy 18-year-old.
articles.title: Billionaire Biohacker Who Wants to Live Forever Just Started 'Penis Rejuvenation' Therapy

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: Another DAO, another controversy. The latest Gitcoin debacle has revived an age-old question: Are DAOs really better than the firm?
articles.title: What’s a DAO to Do? Gitcoin Backlash Shows Crypto Governance Is More Than a Meme

articles.description: Angelic is a sci-fi roleplay game in development that will be free-to-play and offer optional, opt-in crypto features on Solana and Ethereum and a governance token. Metaverse Game Studios CEO and Founder Erkan Bayol tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how he sees AAA traditional games as Angelic's main competitors and shares his vision for the game.
articles.title: Interview: Angelic CEO on Building the Sci-Fi RPG on Solana and Ethereum

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: Arbitrum has enjoyed continued growth even after the ARB airdrop, as new users pile into the speedy layer-2.
articles.title: Ethereum Layer-2 Arbitrum Sees Ongoing ‘Influx’ of New Users After ARB Airdrop: Nansen

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: The re-skilling needs are varied, said researchers, but executives think employee roles will be augmented rather than replaced.
articles.title: 40% of Workers Will Need New Job Training Due to AI: IBM

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The layer-1 blockchain Algorand, already in regulators’ crosshairs, suffered yet another breakdown during the latest market crash.
articles.title: Algorand Hits New All-Time Low Amid Market Downturn

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: With at least a dozen Ethereum futures ETF applications already submitted, this October could be a big one for the markets.
articles.title: SEC Expected to Approve Ethereum Futures ETFs by October: Report

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: The undisclosed acquisition means that RIAs from Onramp Invest will be able to turn to Securitize's tokenization offering.
articles.title: Securitize Acquires $40B Crypto Fund Manager Onramp Invest

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The AP releases guidelines on using generative AI, as the storied news agency emphasizes the role of human oversight in journalism.
articles.title: Associated Press Limits How Journalists Can Use Generative AI

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Once the largest NFT marketplace by trading volume, OpenSea has revealed plans to stop enforcing creator royalty fees on secondary trades.
articles.title: OpenSea Will Make Creator Royalties Optional for NFT Trades

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: As one of DeGod’s co-founders stepped away, a known NFT whale pressured the collection’s floor price.
articles.title: DeGods Co-Founder Departs Amid Falling NFT Prices and Pushback

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Bitcoin crashed hard on Thursday afternoon, dipping below $26,000. The rest of the crypto market followed suit—as did the liquidations.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Flash Crash Triggers $800 Million in Liquidations

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Bankrupt crypto exchange FTX has reached a settlement agreement with Genesis over claims tied to Alameda, though it must still be approved.
articles.title: FTX and Genesis Reach $175 Million Settlement After $4 Billion Demand

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Google is using the power of AI to help you figure out your life. How soon before the machines replace human wisdom?
articles.title: Google Is Testing a New AI Life Coach

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Modern Warfare III will offer a new campaign, upgraded maps from 2009's Modern Warfare 2, and the largest Zombies map to date.
articles.title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III Revealed—5 Things You Need to Know

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: The company is also suspending trading for DAI and RAI, claiming they no longer meet listing standards.
articles.title: Coinbase Suspends Tether Trading in Canada

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The blocky, meme-fueling creature is back as a $2 NFT on Base, offering perks to holders while celebrating Pixelmon’s disastrous reveal.
articles.title: Kevin Returns: Pixelmon's 'Horrible Mistake' Reborn as Base NFT

articles.description: Ben Prendergast is an actor who has voiced characters like Apex Legends' Fuse, God of War Ragnarok's Tyr, and Patroclus in Hades. But as debates swirl around the use of artificial intelligence in entertainment in light of the SAG-AFTRA and WGA strikes, Prendergast gives Decrypt's Kate Irwin his honest take on the potential use of AI actors in games.
articles.title: Apex Legends Voice Actor on AI's Impact on Video Games

articles.description: Decrypt's Jason Nelson speaks with Star Atlas Founder and CEO Michael Wagner about the MMO game's approach to development, marketing, and blockchain integrations.
articles.title: Star Atlas CEO on Developing an MMO Game

articles.description: Decrypt's Jason Nelson talks to Aurory's Head of Marketing and Business Development Michael Natoli about the origins of the Aurory crypto games at the Solana PlayGG event.
articles.title: Aurory's Origin Story: How JRPGs Inspired the Games

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin goes hands-on with Parallel’s closed beta on Windows PC to find out what sets it apart from other crypto card-battlers.
articles.title: Parallel TCG: Inside the Sci-Fi Card Game’s Closed Beta

articles.description: Solana Foundation's General Manager of Games Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about Solana's PlayGG conference and shares his take on crypto gaming and the "play-to-earn" concept.
articles.title: Web3 Games Need to Compete with All Games, Says Solana Foundation GM

articles.description: "I wrote them off," Twitch streamer Alliestrasza said of her initial thoughts on many early blockchain games. She tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how her perspective on Web3 games has evolved over time and now sees blockchain games getting significantly better.
articles.title: Many Early Blockchain Games Were 'Cash Grabs,' Says Twitch Streamer Alliestrasza

articles.description: MetalCore is an upcoming mech shooter developed by Studio 369, and it's being developed on Ethereum scaling network Immutable zkEVM. Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin played through the prologue and tested out the recent Alpha 3 online experience to get a sense of the NFT-infused mashup of Titanfall and Destiny.
articles.title: 'MetalCore' Game Preview: Hands-on With the 'Titanfall' Meets 'Destiny' NFT Mashup

articles.description: Aurory is an NFT-driven game franchise that started life on Solana and is expanding to other chains. Decrypt's Jason Nelson spoke with Aurory Head of Marketing Michael Natoli at Solana's PlayGG event, where Natoli shared his thoughts on the challenges that blockchain games face in reaching players.
articles.title: 'Give Projects a Chance,' Says Aurory's Michael Natoli on NFT Game Challenges

articles.description: Solana Foundation General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how the Solana network will tackle the scaling problem that blockchain games pose for the industry.
articles.title: Solana Is Only Network Ready for Gaming: Solana Foundation's Johnny Lee

articles.description: Kyu Lee is the President of game studio Com2uS USA. In an interview, he shares the studio's approach to Web3 and crypto gaming with Decrypt GG's Kate Irwin.
articles.title: Com2uS Is Going "Full Speed" on Crypto Gaming: Kyu Lee

articles.description: Decrypt's Jason Nelson interviews Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos Creative Director Alex Finden at the Solana PlayGG event in San Diego, California.
articles.title: Building a Discord Game with AI and Blockchain: 'Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos' Creative Lead Alex Finden

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: CEO of the dYdX Foundation Charles d'Haussy unpacks the decision behind moving one of the largest decentralized exchange protocol's over to its very own chain built on Cosmos. A key driver, he told Decrypt at this year's EthCC event, was that instead of launching on a rollup or another layer-1, launching a fully customized chain will allow dYdX to fine tune the network for its product's needs.
articles.title: 'Big Respect Between Ethereum and Cosmos Developer Communities': dYdX Foundation CEO

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Marin Tvrdić, a business development contributor to the Lido DAO, sat down with Decrypt during this year's EthCC to break down how the liquid staking protocol has managed such a massive lead, how it plans to keep that lead, and the protocol's new dual-governance tokenomics.
articles.title: Ethereum Staking Solution Lido 'Had Perfect Product Market Fit' at Launch, Says DAO's Biz Dev Contributor

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: OpenZeppelin's security solutions architect Michael Lewellen sat down with Decrypt to discuss how the industry can become a little safer for users at this year's EthCC Paris. The key? Introducing security standards across the industry so folks know what an audit actually means and where risks lie, be it bad faith actors or poor implementation.
articles.title: What's Going to Stop All the DeFi Hacks? 'Standards,' Says OpenZepplin Security Architect

articles.description: Ev.io is a web-based first-person shooter that's free to play, but lets NFT holders earn in-game currency that can be redeemed for Solana (SOL). Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin shares his review of the fun throwback to Quake-style blasting, albeit with a modern crypto twist.
articles.title: 'Ev.io' Game Review: Earn Solana While Blasting Enemies

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Account abstraction this, smart wallets that. Discussions at EthCC Paris about improving user experience have pointed at industry leader MetaMask as an example of what not to do. But that may soon change, with a host of updates and optimizations coming to crypto's number one wallet, said its product lead Alex Jupiter. It still may take some time, though, before these changes take effect.
articles.title: 'Moving Fast and Breaking Things Isn't the Web3 Ethos': MetaMask Product Lead

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Argent co-founder Julien Niset told Decrypt at EthCC Paris that he wants to make crypto wallets disappear. Or at least how they're currently conceived. From clunky seed phrases to a stiff user experience, Argent hopes to make using crypto a little less intimidating and a whole lot more fun.
articles.title: Scaling Smart Wallets on Starknet 'Was The Winning Combination', Says Argent Co-Founder
